name: Computerfriend
description:
The year is 1999. The place is Godfield, Louisiana: the tech capital of the world, where the sky bleeds acid and the mud boils in the bayou. It’s time for your state-mandated digital therapy.

Computerfriend is a text-based interactive fiction game by Kit Riemer. 20-60 minute playtime, 6 endings. You can download it here or play it in your browser at the 2022 Spring Thing IF festival if you like.
